Map

Class Map_Test

  • java.lang.Object
    • Map.Map_Test

  • public class Map_Test
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the JUnit Test cases for Map class. this implements all the test related to the units within this class.
    Since:
    2018-10-01
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Arun

      • testAllTerritoriesOwnBySinglePlayer

        public void testAllTerritoriesOwnBySinglePlayer()
        This method is used to test if all territories are owner by a single user that signals end of the game. return True if all the territories are owned by a user return False if not all the territories are owned by the user

      • testAllTerritoriesNotOwnBySinglePlayer

        public void testAllTerritoriesNotOwnBySinglePlayer()
        This method is used to test if all territories are owner by a single user that signals end of the game. return True if all the territories are owned by a user return False if not all the territories are owned by the user

        public void testMapStringIntNewContinentName()
        This is a Map constructor that accept the parm Continent name and the score and list it in the continent Arraylist to be connected it tests if the returned Continent name equated the expected value return the instance of newly created continent and score

      • testMapStringIntNewContinentScore

        public void testMapStringIntNewContinentScore()
        This is a Map constructor that accept the parm Continent name and the score and list it in the continent Arraylist to be connected it tests if the returned Continent score equated the expected value return the instance of newly created continent and score

      • testAddContinentName

        public void testAddContinentName()
        This is to add the continent with its score. since we have set this value in the @before its not re initiated here again it tests if the returned Continent name equated the expected value return the instance of newly created continent and score

      • testAddContinentScore

        public void testAddContinentScore()
        This is to add the continent with its score. since we have set this value in the @before its not re initiated here again it tests if the returned Continent score equated the expected value return the instance of newly created continent and score

      • testValidateMapForValidMap

        public void testValidateMapForValidMap()
                                throws java.io.IOException
        This method is used to test if Map is a valid one. return True if all the territories are owned by a user return False if not all the territories are owned by the user

        java.io.IOException
